text: The Super Mario Bros. 35th Anniversary was a special event also happening in Nintendo games. To remember the Super Mario Series created in 1985, Nintendo made a special Nintendo Direct and released many Super Mario related products. These products include: * Super Mario Bros. 35 (a special edition of Super Mario Bros., which lets 35 people play a battle royale to be the last standing.) * Super Mario 3D World + Bowser's Fury (The Nintendo Switch remaster of the Wii U game) * Mario Kart LIVE: Home Circuit (an RC toy required installment in the long-lasting series) * Super Mario 3D All Stars (Contains remastered ports of Mario 64, Sunshine, & Galaxy 1) * A Nintendo Game & Watch with a special Super Mario Bros. Theme (Featuring Mario Bros. 1 & The Lost Levels) * Toys/Clothing/Shoes at The Nintendo Store * Special Super Mario themed events happening in Splatoon 2, Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, Animal Crossing: New Horizons, Mario Kart Tour, etc. Category:Mario video games Category:2020 events
title: Super Mario Bros. 35th Anniversary
